pr_title: Notify users to restart Elasticsearch after plugin installation

timeline.message: Add message to notify users to restart Elasticsearch after plugin installation

timeline.bodyText: Putting the notification here, inside the loop, will print a new line after every plugin that is installed, and double the output of the tool. In my opinion, we only need to issue the restart notification once, so it would be better to move this below the catch block to line 267, removing the plugin name from the output.
timeline.author: williamrandolph

replies.bodyText: Thanks, that is indeed a good suggestion!
